original: @128b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'khor lo gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @128b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'khor lo gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokite≈õvara,

original: sa bla dang ni sa stengs sa 'og dud 'gro la sogs sbyong ba yi //
analyzed: sa bla dang ni sa stengs sa 'og dud 'gro la sogs sbyong ba yi //
translated: who purifies the animal realm and so on, above, on, and below the earth.

original: 'khor lo dri med dkar dang dmar po rnam par sngo //
analyzed: 'khor lo dri med dkar dang dmar po rnam par sngo //
translated: The wheel is stainless, white, and red, and is marked with a blue syllable.

original: spyi bo snying ga lte ba'i dbus bzhugs zla ba dang / padmo nyi ma ham dang h'um dang a'a:sa mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: spyi bo snying ga lte ba'i dbus bzhugs zla ba dang / padmo nyi ma ham dang h'um dang a'a:sa mtshan pa'o //
translated: It is located in the center of the head, heart, and navel, marked with a moon, lotus, sun, ha·πÉ, h≈´·πÉ, and ƒÅ·∏•.

original: de la spyi bo bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i 'khor lo zla ba'i kha dog can no //
analyzed: de la spyi bo bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i 'khor lo zla ba'i kha dog can no //
translated: There, the wheel of thirty-two spokes in the head, which is the nature of great bliss, is the color of the moon.

original: de'i snying po la ni gsal byed dmar pos brgyan to //
analyzed: de'i snying po la ni gsal byed dmar pos brgyan to //
translated: Its center is adorned with a red consonant.

original: snying gar ni chos kyi bdag nyid kyi 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i padma 'bur pa byi ru'i kha dog can no //
analyzed: snying gar ni chos kyi bdag nyid kyi 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i padma 'bur pa byi ru'i kha dog can no //
translated: In the heart, which is the nature of phenomena, is a sixteen-petaled lotus, the color of coral.

original: de'i snying po la ni dbyangs yig dkar pos brgyan to //
analyzed: de'i snying po la ni dbyangs yig dkar pos brgyan to //
translated: Its center is adorned with a white vowel.

original: lte bar ni sbrul pa'i bdag nyid kyi rtsibs drug cu rtsa bzhi ral gri'i kha dog can no //
analyzed: lte bar ni sbrul pa'i bdag nyid kyi rtsibs drug cu rtsa bzhi ral gri'i kha dog can no //
translated: In the navel, which is the nature of emanation, is a sixty-four-spoked wheel, the color of a sword.

original: de'i snying po la ni 'bebs pa sngon pos brgyan to //
analyzed: de'i snying po la ni 'bebs pa sngon pos brgyan to //
translated: Its essence is adorned with the blue drop.

original: gsum ka'i srog shing ni rtsa mchog go //
analyzed: gsum ka'i srog shing ni rtsa mchog go //
translated: The life-tree of all three is the supreme channel.

original: lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i rlung gis bskor bar bya'o //üîΩ'og mas ni sdud bar bya'o //
analyzed: lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i rlung gis bskor bar bya'o // 'og mas ni sdud bar bya'o //
translated: The wind called ‚Äúhook‚Äù should be rotated.üîΩThe lower one should be drawn in.

original: thog mas ni dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: thog mas ni dbab par bya'o //
translated: The upper one should be brought down.

original: bar mas ni bsre bar bya'o //
analyzed: bar mas ni bsre bar bya'o //
translated: The middle one should be mixed.

original: thams cad las ni ye shes rang byung ngo //
analyzed: thams cad las ni ye shes rang byung ngo //
translated: From all of them, self-arisen gnosis.

original: 'dzag pa la sogs pa'i rim pa yang phreng ba'i 'khor lo la'o //
analyzed: 'dzag pa la sogs pa'i rim pa yang phreng ba'i 'khor lo la'o //
translated: The stages of dripping and so forth are in the garland wheel.

original: rab tu gsal ba dang bde ba chen po dang rnam par mi rtog pa 'byung bar @129a * //
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba dang bde ba chen po dang rnam par mi rtog pa 'byung bar @129a * //
translated: It is said that clarity, great bliss, and nonconceptuality will arise.

original: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: rtsa dang rlung dang thig le nyid sbyor bar bshad do //
analyzed: rtsa dang rlung dang thig le nyid sbyor bar bshad do //
translated: The union of the channels, winds, and drops is explained.

original: pha dang ma dang bde bar gshegs ba'i snying po'i sa bon no //
analyzed: pha dang ma dang bde bar gshegs ba'i snying po'i sa bon no //
translated: Father, mother, and the seed of the sugata essence.

original: thog ma dang tha ma dang bar ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma dang bar ro //
translated: Beginning, end, and middle.

original: sku gsung thugs rnam par sbyong ba nyid do //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs rnam par sbyong ba nyid do //
translated: The purification of body, speech, and mind.

original: 'dus byas 'dus ma byas gnyis med //
analyzed: 'dus byas 'dus ma byas gnyis med //
translated: The nonduality of the conditioned and the unconditioned.

original: zab mo mngon par 'byung ba'i lam //
analyzed: zab mo mngon par 'byung ba'i lam //
translated: The path of the profound emergence

original: rtog pa'i rgyal po las bsdus pa //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rgyal po las bsdus pa //
translated: is compiled from the King of Contemplations

original: rnal 'byor la phan byed pa yin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor la phan byed pa yin //
translated: and is beneficial for yogins and yoginƒ´s.

original: spyan ras gzigs 'khor lo gsum bsgom pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs 'khor lo gsum bsgom pa rdzogs so//
translated: The meditation on the three wheels of Avalokite≈õvara is complete.
